scripts.build: npm run clean; npm run scripts; npm run styles
scripts.clean: rm -f build/images/*; rm -f build/scripts/*; rm -f build/styles/*; rm -f npm-debug.log
scripts.styles: node_modules/node-sass/bin/node-sass --output-style compressed styles/major.scss build/styles/major.css; node_modules/node-sass/bin/node-sass --output-style compressed styles/minor.scss build/styles/minor.css
